mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(surveyno, survey_title, start_date, fin_date, y_n, cnt, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, recom) VALUES(survey_seq.nextval, #{survey_title}, #{start_date}, #{fin_date}, #{y_n}, #{cnt}, #{poster}, #{postersaved}, #{posterthumb}, #{postersize}, #{recom})
mapper.select: SELECT surveyno, survey_title, start_date, fin_date, y_n, cnt, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, recom FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM survey
WHERE (UPPER(survey_title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY start_date ASC

SELECT surveyno, survey_title, start_date, fin_date, y_n, cnt, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, recom FROM survey
WHERE (UPPER(survey_title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY start_date ASC

SELECT surveyno, survey_title, start_date, fin_date, y_n, cnt, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, recom, r FROM ( SELECT surveyno, survey_title, start_date, fin_date, y_n, cnt, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, recom, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT surveyno, survey_title, start_date, fin_date, y_n, cnt, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, recom FROM survey WHERE (UPPER(survey_title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') ORDER BY start_date ASC ) ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE survey SET y_n='Y' WHERE surveyno=#{surveyno}
UPDATE survey SET y_n='N' WHERE surveyno=#{surveyno}
